00069 /* Exported types ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00070 /** @defgroup USBDevice_Exported_Types USB Device exported types
00071   * @{
00072   */
00073 /* USB Endpoint number                                                                                      */
00074 typedef enum
00075 {
00076   USBD_EPT0  = 0,
00077   USBD_EPT1  = 1,
00078   USBD_EPT2  = 2,
00079   USBD_EPT3  = 3,
00080   USBD_EPT4  = 4,
00081   USBD_EPT5  = 5,
00082   USBD_EPT6  = 6,
00083   USBD_EPT7  = 7,
00084   #if (LIBCFG_USBD_V2)
00085   USBD_EPT8  = 8,
00086   USBD_EPT9  = 9,
00087   #endif
00088   USBD_NOEPT = -1,
00089 } USBD_EPTn_Enum;
00090 
00091 typedef enum
00092 {
00093   USBD_TCR_0 = 0,
00094   USBD_TCR_1 = 16,
00095 } USBD_TCR_Enum;
00096 
00097 typedef enum
00098 {
00099   USBD_NAK = 0,
00100   USBD_ACK = 1
00101 } USBD_Handshake_Enum;
00102 
00103 /* Endpoint CFGR Register                                                                                   */
00104 typedef struct _EPTCFGR_BIT
00105 {
00106   vu32 EPBUFA: 10;
00107   vu32 EPLEN : 10;
00108   vu32 _RES0 :  3;
00109   vu32 SDBS  :  1;
00110   vu32 EPADR :  4;
00111   vu32 EPDIR :  1;
00112   vu32 EPTYPE:  1;
00113   vu32 _RES1 :  1;
00114   vu32 EPEN  :  1;
00115 } USBD_EPTCFGR_Bit;
00116 
00117 typedef union _EPTCFGR_TYPEDEF
00118 {
00119   USBD_EPTCFGR_Bit bits;
00120   u32 word;
00121 } USBD_EPTCFGR_TypeDef;
00122 
00123 /* Endpoint CFGR and IER Register                                                                           */
00124 typedef struct
00125 {
00126   USBD_EPTCFGR_TypeDef CFGR;
00127   u32 IER;
00128 } USBD_EPTInit_TypeDef;
00129 
00130 /* Endpoint 0 ~ MAX_EP_NUM                                                                                  */
00131 typedef struct
00132 {
00133   u32 uInterruptMask;
00134   USBD_EPTInit_TypeDef ept[MAX_EP_NUM];
00135 } USBD_Driver_TypeDef;

00137   * @}

00140 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00141 /** @defgroup USBDevice_Exported_Constants USB Device exported constants
00142   * @{
00143   */
00144 
00145 /* USB Interrupt Enable Register (USBIER)                                                                   */
00146 #define UGIE                        ((u32)0x00000001)   /*!< USB global Interrupt Enable                    */
00147 #define SOFIE                       ((u32)0x00000002)   /*!< Start Of Frame Interrupt Enable                */
00148 #define URSTIE                      ((u32)0x00000004)   /*!< USB Reset Interrupt Enable                     */
00149 #define RSMIE                       ((u32)0x00000008)   /*!< Resume Interrupt Enable                        */
00150 #define SUSPIE                      ((u32)0x00000010)   /*!< Suspend Interrupt Enable                       */
00151 #define ESOFIE                      ((u32)0x00000020)   /*!< Expected Start Of Frame Interrupt Enable       */
00152 #define FRESIE                      ((u32)0x00000040)   /*!< Force USB Reset Control Interrupt Enable       */
00153 #define EP0IE                       ((u32)0x00000100)   /*!< Endpoint 0 Interrupt Enable                    */
00154 #define EP1IE                       ((u32)0x00000200)   /*!< Endpoint 1 Interrupt Enable                    */
00155 #define EP2IE                       ((u32)0x00000400)   /*!< Endpoint 2 Interrupt Enable                    */
00156 #define EP3IE                       ((u32)0x00000800)   /*!< Endpoint 3 Interrupt Enable                    */
00157 #define EP4IE                       ((u32)0x00001000)   /*!< Endpoint 4 Interrupt Enable                    */
00158 #define EP5IE                       ((u32)0x00002000)   /*!< Endpoint 5 Interrupt Enable                    */
00159 #define EP6IE                       ((u32)0x00004000)   /*!< Endpoint 6 Interrupt Enable                    */
00160 #define EP7IE                       ((u32)0x00008000)   /*!< Endpoint 7 Interrupt Enable                    */
00161 
00162 /* USB Interrupt Status Register (USBISR)                                                                   */
00163 #define SOFIF                       ((u32)0x00000002)   /*!< Start Of Frame Interrupt Flag                  */
00164 #define URSTIF                      ((u32)0x00000004)   /*!< USB Reset Interrupt Flag                       */
00165 #define RSMIF                       ((u32)0x00000008)   /*!< Resume Interrupt Flag                          */
00166 #define SUSPIF                      ((u32)0x00000010)   /*!< Suspend Interrupt Flag                         */
00167 #define ESOFIF                      ((u32)0x00000020)   /*!< Expected Start Of Frame Interrupt Flag         */
00168 #define FRESIF                      ((u32)0x00000040)   /*!< Force USB Reset Control Interrupt Flag         */
00169 #define EP0IF                       ((u32)0x00000100)   /*!< Endpoint 0 Interrupt flag                      */
00170 #define EP1IF                       ((u32)0x00000200)   /*!< Endpoint 1 Interrupt flag                      */
00171 #define EP2IF                       ((u32)0x00000400)   /*!< Endpoint 2 Interrupt flag                      */
00172 #define EP3IF                       ((u32)0x00000800)   /*!< Endpoint 3 Interrupt flag                      */
00173 #define EP4IF                       ((u32)0x00001000)   /*!< Endpoint 4 Interrupt flag                      */
00174 #define EP5IF                       ((u32)0x00002000)   /*!< Endpoint 5 Interrupt flag                      */
00175 #define EP6IF                       ((u32)0x00004000)   /*!< Endpoint 6 Interrupt flag                      */
00176 #define EP7IF                       ((u32)0x00008000)   /*!< Endpoint 7 Interrupt flag                      */
00177 #if (LIBCFG_USBD_V2)
00178 #define EP8IF                       ((u32)0x00010000)   /*!< Endpoint 8 Interrupt flag                      */
00179 #define EP9IF                       ((u32)0x00020000)   /*!< Endpoint 9 Interrupt flag                      */
00180 #define EPnIF                       ((u32)0x0003FF00)   /*!< Endpoint n Interrupt flag                      */
00181 #else
00182 #define EPnIF                       ((u32)0x0000FF00)   /*!< Endpoint n Interrupt flag                      */
00183 #endif
00184 
00185 
00186 /* USB Endpoint n Interrupt Enable Register (USBEPnIER)                                                     */
00187 #define OTRXIE                      ((u32)0x00000001)   /*!< OUT Token Received Interrupt Enable            */
00188 #define ODRXIE                      ((u32)0x00000002)   /*!< OUT Data Received Interrupt Enable             */
00189 #define ODOVIE                      ((u32)0x00000004)   /*!< OUT Data Buffer Overrun Interrupt Enable       */
00190 #define ITRXIE                      ((u32)0x00000008)   /*!< IN Token Received Interrupt Enable             */
00191 #define IDTXIE                      ((u32)0x00000010)   /*!< IN Data Transmitted Interrupt Enable           */
00192 #define NAKIE                       ((u32)0x00000020)   /*!< NAK Transmitted Interrupt Enable               */
00193 #define STLIE                       ((u32)0x00000040)   /*!< STALL Transmitted Interrupt Enable             */
00194 #define UERIE                       ((u32)0x00000080)   /*!< USB Error Interrupt Enable                     */
00195 #define STRXIE                      ((u32)0x00000100)   /*!< SETUP Token Received Interrupt Enable          */
00196 #define SDRXIE                      ((u32)0x00000200)   /*!< SETUP Data Received Interrupt Enable           */
00197 #define SDERIE                      ((u32)0x00000400)   /*!< SETUP Data Error Interrupt Enable              */
00198 #define ZLRXIE                      ((u32)0x00000800)   /*!< Zero Length Data Received Interrupt Enable     */
00199 
00200 /* USB Endpoint n Interrupt Status Register (USBEPnISR)                                                     */
00201 #define OTRXIF                      ((u32)0x00000001)   /*!< OUT Token Received Interrupt Flag              */
00202 #define ODRXIF                      ((u32)0x00000002)   /*!< OUT Data Received Interrupt Flag               */
00203 #define ODOVIF                      ((u32)0x00000004)   /*!< OUT Data Buffer Overrun Interrupt Flag         */
00204 #define ITRXIF                      ((u32)0x00000008)   /*!< IN Token Received Interrupt Flag               */
00205 #define IDTXIF                      ((u32)0x00000010)   /*!< IN Data Transmitted Interrupt Flag             */
00206 #define NAKIF                       ((u32)0x00000020)   /*!< NAK Transmitted Interrupt Flag                 */
00207 #define STLIF                       ((u32)0x00000040)   /*!< STALL Transmitted Interrupt Flag               */
00208 #define UERIF                       ((u32)0x00000080)   /*!< USB Error Interrupt Flag                       */
00209 #define STRXIF                      ((u32)0x00000100)   /*!< SETUP Token Received Interrupt Flag            */
00210 #define SDRXIF                      ((u32)0x00000200)   /*!< SETUP Data Received Interrupt Flag             */
00211 #define SDERIF                      ((u32)0x00000400)   /*!< SETUP Data Error Interrupt Flag                */
00212 #define ZLRXIF                      ((u32)0x00000800)   /*!< Zero Length Data Received Interrupt Flag       */
00213 
00214 /* USB Endpoint n Control and Status Register (USBEPnCSR)                                                   */
00215 #define DTGTX                       ((u32)0x00000001)   /*!< Data Toggle Status, for IN transfer            */
00216 #define NAKTX                       ((u32)0x00000002)   /*!< NAK Status, for IN transfer                    */
00217 #define STLTX                       ((u32)0x00000004)   /*!< STALL Status, for IN transfer                  */
00218 #define DTGRX                       ((u32)0x00000008)   /*!< Data Toggle Status, for OUT transfer           */
00219 #define NAKRX                       ((u32)0x00000010)   /*!< NAK Status, for OUT transfer                   */
00220 #define STLRX                       ((u32)0x00000020)   /*!< STALL Status, for OUT transfer                 */
00221 
00222 /* For USBD_EPTGetTranssferCount function                                                                   */
00223 #define USBD_CNTB0                  (USBD_TCR_0)
00224 #define USBD_CNTB1                  (USBD_TCR_1)
00225 #define USBD_CNTIN                  (USBD_TCR_0)
00226 #define USBD_CNTOUT                 (USBD_TCR_1)
00227 /**
00228   * @}
00229   */
00230 
00231 /* Exported macro ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00232 /** @defgroup USBDevice_Exported_Macro USB Device exported macro
00233   * @{
00234   */
00235 /* API macro for USB Core - Global event and operation                                                      */
00236 #define API_USB_INIT(driver)                      (USBD_Init(driver))
00237 #define API_USB_DEINIT()                          (USBD_DeInit())
00238 #define API_USB_POWER_UP(driver, power)           (USBD_PowerUp(driver, power))
00239 #define API_USB_POWER_OFF()                       (USBD_PowerOff())
00240 #define API_USB_POWER_ON()                        (USBD_PowerOn())
00241 #define API_USB_REMOTE_WAKEUP()                   (USBD_RemoteWakeup())
00242 #define API_USB_READ_SETUP(buffer)                (USBD_ReadSETUPData((u32 *)(buffer)))
00243 #define API_USB_SET_ADDR(addr)                    (USBD_SetAddress(addr))
00244 #define API_USB_GET_CTRL_IN_LEN()                 (USBD_EPTGetBufferLen(USBD_EPT0))
00245 #define API_USB_ENABLE_INT(flag)                  (USBD_EnableINT(flag))
00246 #define API_USB_GET_INT()                         (USBD_GetINT())
00247 #define API_USB_GET_EPT_NUM(flag)                 (USBD_GetEPTnINTNumber(flag))
00248 #define API_USB_IS_SETUP_INT(flag)                (flag & SDRXIF)
00249 #define API_USB_CLR_SETUP_INT()                   (USBD_EPTClearINT(USBD_EPT0, SDRXIF))
00250 #define API_USB_IS_RESET_INT(flag)                (flag & URSTIF)
00251 #define API_USB_CLR_RESET_INT()                   (USBD_ClearINT(URSTIF))
00252 #define API_USB_IS_SOF_INT(flag)                  (flag & SOFIF)
00253 #define API_USB_CLR_SOF_INT()                     (USBD_ClearINT(SOFIF))
00254 #define API_USB_IS_FRES_INT(flag)                 (flag & FRESIF)
00255 #define API_USB_CLR_FRES_INT()                    (USBD_ClearINT(FRESIF))
00256 #define API_USB_IS_RESUME_INT(flag)               (flag & RSMIF)
00257 #define API_USB_CLR_RESUME_INT()                  (USBD_ClearINT(RSMIF))
00258 #define API_USB_IS_SUSPEND_INT(flag)              (flag & SUSPIF)
00259 #define API_USB_CLR_SUSPEND_INT()                 (USBD_ClearINT(SUSPIF))
00260 #define API_USB_IS_EPTn_INT(flag, EPTn)           (flag & (EP0IF << EPTn))
00261 #define API_USB_CLR_EPTn_INT(EPTn)                (USBD_ClearINT(EP0IF << EPTn))
00262 
00263 /* API macro for USB Core - Endpoint event and operation                                                    */
00264 #define API_USB_EPTn_INIT(EPTn, driver)           (USBD_EPTInit(EPTn, driver))
00265 #define API_USB_EPTn_RESET(EPTn)                  (USBD_EPTReset(EPTn))
00266 #define API_USB_EPTn_SEND_STALL(EPTn)             (USBD_EPTSendSTALL(EPTn))
00267 #define API_USB_EPTn_GET_INT(EPTn)                (USBD_EPTGetINT(EPTn))
00268 #define API_USB_EPTn_IS_IN_INT(flag)              (flag & IDTXIF)
00269 #define API_USB_EPTn_CLR_IN_INT(EPTn)             (USBD_EPTClearINT(EPTn, IDTXIF))
00270 #define API_USB_EPTn_IS_OUT_INT(flag)             (flag & ODRXIF)
00271 #define API_USB_EPTn_CLR_OUT_INT(EPTn)            (USBD_EPTClearINT(EPTn, ODRXIF))
00272 #define API_USB_EPTn_IS_INT(flag)                 (flag & (ODRXIF | IDTXIF))
00273 #define API_USB_EPTn_CLR_INT(EPTn)                (USBD_EPTClearINT(EPTn, (ODRXIF | IDTXIF)))
00274 #define API_USB_EPTn_GET_HALT(EPTn)               (USBD_EPTGetHalt(EPTn))
00275 #define API_USB_EPTn_SET_HALT(EPTn)               (USBD_EPTSetHalt(EPTn))
00276 #define API_USB_EPTn_CLR_HALT(EPTn)               (USBD_EPTClearHalt(EPTn))
00277 #define API_USB_EPTn_WAIT_STALL_SENT(EPTn)        (USBD_EPTWaitSTALLSent(EPTn))
00278 #define API_USB_EPTn_CLR_DTG(EPTn)                (USBD_EPTClearDTG(EPTn))
00279 #define API_USB_EPTn_GET_BUFFLEN(EPTn)            (USBD_EPTGetBufferLen(EPTn))
00280 #define API_USB_EPTn_GET_CNT(EPTn, type)          (USBD_EPTGetTransferCount(EPTn, type))
00281 #define API_USB_EPTn_WRITE_IN(EPTn, from, len)    (USBD_EPTWriteINData(EPTn, from, len))
00282 #define API_USB_EPTn_READ_OUT(EPTn, to, len)      (USBD_EPTReadOUTData(EPTn, to, len))
00283 #define API_USB_EPTn_READ_MEM(EPTn, to, len)      (USBD_EPTReadMemory(EPTn, to, len))
00284 /**
00285   * @}
00286   */

00325 u32  USBD_EPTGetTransferCount(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn, USBD_TCR_Enum USBD_TCR_0or1);
